title: New free champion rotation: Sion, Lucian, Jinx and more!

replies.body: why are both portraits for {{champion:53}} in this article when the new one, used in the picture at the top, is still only on the PBE?
It just occurred to me that it could mean that the new patch containing the splash could be coming this week.

Yep along with {{champion:28}}{{champion:79}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:81}} and hopefully {{champion:103}} splash art updates
Not Evelynn.
TALON OMG

{{champion:32}} 100% more whiney champs
{{champion:53}} 30% less getting away
{{champion:222}} 25% more across the map KS
{{champion:55}} 10% less farm mid lane 
{{champion:236}} 15% more poke
{{champion:82}}  20% less crowd control 
{{champion:92}}  30% hotter skins
{{champion:14}}  40% suckier ults
{{champion:106}} 20% more being thrown around
{{champion:143}} 50% more sucky players with a good champ

More like
{{champion:14}} 40% more ults into walls/from base to enemy base
soo true{{item:3151}}
45% of all statistics are fake, including this one XD

actually only 3 of them are true, 
{{champion:53}} is almost true, because he is one of 3 champions with a "hook" mechanism, the other two are {{champion:111}} and {{champion:412}} the real percentage would be 33%
{{champion:222}} I believe is true because as far as I am aware 4 champions have across the map abilities (unless you count {{champion:80}} 's sky fall)The other champs are {{champion:81}} ,{{champion:22}} ,and {{champion:30}} there may be more but I couldn't think of them
{{champion:82}} is true because he has no crowd control so in a team fight there would be 20% less crowd control on Mordekaiser's team.
there is {{champion:119}}

Lucian, Jinx, AND Blitzcrank. This is a bad week for us ADC and support mains...





I'm scared...
I feel you, my Vayne isn't happening this week :(
Request: Janna hasn't been free in the past 2 weeks, I've been worried sick about her. Is Janna okay? Will she be free soon? I thought it was every week but I guess I was lied to...
Janna isnt free she's $2.95 a minute lol

{{champion:53}} {{champion:236}} stay out of bot lane
{{champion:55}} stay out of mid
{{champion:92}} stay out of top
maybe this is riot's way of giving player's an incentive to play ranked
You can jungle
{{champion:32}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:106}} lolnope

Easy solutions: 

Bot lane: {{champion:81}} never gonna catch me
Mid lane: {{champion:112}} hey look you're silenced
top lane: {{champion:85}} can't do that when you're stunned
Jungle: {{champion:64}} herd u liek your blue buff
it would be a shame if somebody
TOOK IT
NEEDS {{champion:119}}
he was free just a few weeks ago and then on sale.
But {{champion:119}} should be on all the rotations

{{champion:236}}
The unseen Lebron is the deadliest.
Wtf? He ain't unseen, that bitch is seen everywhere.
It was in reference to the roaming comment...

{{champion:32}} They told me to go cry a river. It's called the Nile.
{{champion:53}} I grab tanks in team fights. I'm helping.
{{champion:222}} My chest is so flat, even Annie makes fun of me.
{{champion:55}} My ult is actually me having a seizure. Should I see a doctor about that?
{{champion:236}} I need a hair cut...
{{champion:82}} BR? Hue. BR? Hue. BR? Hue.
{{champion:92}} Using a wind blade before it was cool.
{{champion:14}} One man zombie apocalypse.
{{champion:106}} My parents gave up on naming me half way through...
{{champion:143}} I'm not very good at gardening. Everything I grow dies within a few seconds...
good job! RIOT....But where is {{champion:126}}
Tru Dat! BRING US {{champion:122}} {{champion:83}} and {{champion:126}} ! I beg you! {{item:3026}}
{{champion:83}}  we need, the others will be free eventually
what is this {{champion:83}} everyone is always talking about, and how did a picture of it get in the champion thingy?

After being removed from the free champion rotation for the entire season 3 and 4, {{champion:14}} is back! {{champion:83}} and {{champion:78}} are banned from the free champion rotation since the pre-season 3 {{item:3157}}
